name: Mahjong - legendary Mahjong Solitaire adventure
description:
Use your super tile-matching powers in this Mahjong game to make your way through magic lands.

Mahjong Highlights


• 100+ handmade levels (guaranteed solvable)
• stunning HD quality graphics
• mysterious adventures in six different locations
• play Mahjong offline, your progress is safe
• collect totem pieces to unlock new unique themed tile sets
• free daily rewards for active players
• breathtaking innovative Mahjong game modes
• special bonus levels, timed quests and addicting plot
• powerful boosters to help you overcome difficulties

Mahjong - legendary Mahjong Solitaire adventure is true diamond of Mahjong varieties!
